title: Android 12L Beta 2 now available for Lenovo Tab P12 Pro
content:
Android 12 is still rolling out to many phones and tablets, but Google is already in the middle of working on the next major version, Android 12L. The upcoming update is primarily aimed at foldables and tablets, and since Google doesn’t make Android tablets anymore (RIP Pixel C), the main tablet test device has been

The post Android 12L Beta 2 now available for Lenovo Tab P12 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Two weeks after Pixel phones could try it out, the Lenovo Tab P12 Pro now has a beta build available for Android 12L Beta 2.
